docs.text: Welcome to PACKAGE A template repository for quick Python project setup.
docs.title: Welcome to PACKAGE

docs.text: A template repository for quick Python project setup.
docs.title: Welcome to PACKAGE

docs.text: Getting Started Prerequisites Python 3.10 or higher uv package manager Installation Clone this template, git clone git@github.com:ahmedsalim3/watertemplate.git Replace PACKAGE with your project name Install dependencies: make install Development Setup For development, install additional tools: make install-dev This installs pre-commit hooks and development dependencies. Next Steps Update pyproject.toml with your project details Add your code to the PACKAGE/ directory Write tests in tests/ Update documentation in docs/docs/
docs.title: Getting Started

docs.text: Python 3.10 or higher uv package manager
docs.title: Prerequisites

docs.text: Clone this template, git clone git@github.com:ahmedsalim3/watertemplate.git Replace PACKAGE with your project name Install dependencies: make install
docs.title: Installation

docs.text: For development, install additional tools: make install-dev This installs pre-commit hooks and development dependencies.
docs.title: Development Setup

docs.text: Update pyproject.toml with your project details Add your code to the PACKAGE/ directory Write tests in tests/ Update documentation in docs/docs/
